title: Skarner's Win rate is 65.04%

embed.description: LoL Statistics, Builds, Runes, Masteries, Skill Orders, Counters and Matchups for Skarner when played Jungle. Statistics include Skarner's Win Rate, Play Rate and Ban Rate. Counters include who Skarner Jungle is Strong or Weak Against.

body: His win rate is 65.04% and he have a win rate of 73.09% by 0-25 mins into game. Skarner is probably ridiculously OP right now. You might wanna nerf skarner a little.

replies.body:
This is just like that Gbay video about the Nunu bitching at him for playing a champ with less than 50% winrate

lmaokai

Skarner's ban rate is 100% how does he have a win rate?

Skarnerception.

He was like perma ban from release notes.

Wtf.
